export var localCache={getState:function getState(key){var localKey=localStorage.getItem(key);try{return JSON.parse(localKey);}catch(_unused){// Not JSON
return localKey;}},set:function set(key,value){if(typeof value==='object'||Array.isArray(value)){localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify(value));return;}localStorage.setItem(key,value);},remove:function remove(key){return localStorage.removeItem(key);},clear:function clear(){return localStorage.clear();},getAdminToken:function getAdminToken(){return this.getState('admin_access_token');},getUserToken:function getUserToken(){return this.getState('user_access_token');},getUser:function getUser(){return this.getState('user');},getAdmin:function getAdmin(){return this.getState('admin');},setUserToken:function setUserToken(val){this.set('user_access_token',val);},setUser:function setUser(val){this.set('user',val);},clearUser:function clearUser(){this.remove('user_access_token');this.remove('user');}};
